ygData.subject: Re: Just a bit of fun (longish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Amen, brother, preach on. ... Christ, are you sure you aren t my long lost bardic brother? That s my line, great minds... Harmonic Distortion, 34th ding.
ygData.messageBody:
>One thing that pains me more then anything is to see a Bard
>that ONLY uses bellow in combat :(

Amen, brother, preach on.

>Tonight's song list consists of the following in regular
>combat: Anthem 'de Arms (boast str, atk speed), Psalm of
>warth (grp damage shield and AC), chains (slow atk spd and snare).
>Do not snare or root unless I call for it.

Christ, are you sure you aren't my long lost bardic brother?
That's my line, great minds...

Harmonic Distortion, 34th ding.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
